concept.title: Components Involved in the ROR Integration

section.p: The following picture provides an overview of the main components involved in the integration of and ROR:

In ROR, the basic configurations of virtual platforms (L-Platforms) and virtual servers for typical usage scenarios are defined by the ROR administrators in so-called templates. Virtual images for provisioning the virtual servers are provided in the Virtual Image Pool. For example, a template may define a virtual platform that has a firewall, two application servers, a load balancer, and a database server. Different templates can be made available for small, medium, and large scale operation. Users can choose a template and reconfigure it to their needs.
